name: Personal_Force_Field
display_help: The Force Field is virtually impenetrable to all attacks. The impact of some powerful attacks may occasionally rattle Duray, however the Force Field will hold, and Duray will not suffer any damage or effects from the attacks. The Force Field works both ways, and while active, Duray can only affect himself with other powers.
display_target_help: The Force Field is virtually impenetrable to all attacks. The impact of some powerful attacks may occasionally rattle Duray, however the Force Field will hold, and Duray will not suffer any damage or effects from the attacks. The Force Field works both ways, and while active, Duray can only affect himself with other powers.

name: Dispersion_Bubble
display_help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increase defense to all attacks except psionic. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies inside from Immobilization, Disorient and Hold effects.
display_target_help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increase defense to all attacks except psionic. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies inside from Immobilization, Disorient and Hold effects.
display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from most damage types with a {PowerName}.

name: Protection_Shield
display_help: The Protection Shield protects others from smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy and negative energy attacks for a limited time. The magnetic nature of the shield makes attacks less likely to land and affect your ally. Multiple Shields can be stacked on one target to improve the defense.
display_short_help: Ally +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative)
display_target_help: The Protection Shield protects others from smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy and negative energy attacks for a limited time. The magnetic nature of the shield makes attacks less likely to land and affect your ally. Multiple Shields can be stacked on one target to improve the defense.
display_target_short_help: Ally +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative)
display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from physical attacks with a {PowerName}.

name: Resistance
display_help: Fake Nemesis is an automaton that is resistant to Sleep, Fear, Confusion, and Psionic Damage. It's steam powered armor makes it vulnerable to cold damage.
display_short_help: Auto Res Sleep, Confuse, Fear, Psionic
display_target_help: Fake Nemesis is an automaton that is resistant to Sleep, Fear, Confusion, and Psionic Damage. It's steam powered armor makes it vulnerable to cold damage.
display_target_short_help: Auto Res Sleep, Confuse, Fear, Psionic

name: Vengeance
display_help: The loss of a good leader enrage the team. If a Officer falls in battle, he can grant his teammates a bonus to their defense, their to hit, and their damage with his last breath.

name: Nemesis_Rifle
display_help: The Nemesis Rifle is a basic long range fire arm. Fires a burst of 3 shots at a targeted foe at good range and is very accurate.
display_target_help: The Nemesis Rifle is a basic long range fire arm. Fires a burst of 3 shots at a targeted foe at good range and is very accurate.

name: Triage
display_help: The Nemesis soldiers use this battle field syringe to heals a single targeted ally of some Hit Points. The serum can also free an ally from any Immobilization, Sleep, Disorient and Hold effects and leaves them resistant to such effects for a brief time. Should be performed away from combat as this power can fail if interrupted.
display_target_help: The Nemesis soldiers use this battle field syringe to heals a single targeted ally of some Hit Points. The serum can also free an ally from any Immobilization, Sleep, Disorient and Hold effects and leaves them resistant to such effects for a brief time. Should be performed away from combat as this power can fail if interrupted.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points of damage.

display_help: The Nemesis Monstrosity is capable of firing its Gatling Gun arm is a massive burst to cause Moderate Lethal damage and reduce its target's defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
